entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint-Anicet 10:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -9.9°C
Wind: ENE 16 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
